field.label: Name
field.help: Name for this view (must be unique). Only letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens are allowed.

field.label: View First
field.help: View First controls what happens when there is no match against any view entry. When View First is enabled, and there is no match, a fallback to global "Overrides" hosts (or upstream DNS) will occur. When View First is not enabled there is no fallback to global "Overrides" entries or upstream DNS.

field.label: Description
field.help: You may enter a description here for your reference (not parsed).
